text:
In the HTTP Request Sampler GUI, I would like to send wide-characters for
Internationalization testing.  Currently, I have to use an external utility to
get the URL encoding
creator: lblackmagicwoman@gmail.com
alf@i100.no
text:
I think this bug can be closed as "fixed".
With the new functionality added lately for HTTP POST and GET,
you can enter utf-8 characters in the gui, and by specifying what
"content-encoding" to use, they will be sent correctly to the server.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Please re-open if there still are any problems in the current nightly
